control_attributes.control_description: The organization: a. Establishes and documents usage restrictions, configuration/connection requirements, and implementation guidance for each type of remote access allowed; andb. Authorizes remote access to the information system prior to allowing such connections.

Control Statement: The organization: a. Establishes and documents usage restrictions, configuration/connection requirements, and implementation guidance for each type of remote access allowed; andb. Authorizes remote access to the information system prior to allowing such connections.
